trans-unit.source: Specifies the painting style applied to one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> contained in a form.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o estilo de pintura aplicado a um contido <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: You cannot explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to Custom.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode definir explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> como personalizado.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns Custom when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to an extension of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class that is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> retorna personalizada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é definido como uma extensão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe que não seja <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode" /> is not determined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager" /> or the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> other than <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" />
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode" /> não é determinado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager" /> ou o uso de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> diferente de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" />

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer" /> determines the painting style.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer" /> determina o estilo de pintura.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Indica o uso de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> para pintar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Indica o uso de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" /> para pintar.
